kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
There are 2 sets of icons being used in Xperience's administration today
1. New icons based on the new React admin UI.\ Example: [UI application pages](https://docs.kentico.com/x/2gSiCQ) via their registration attribute. These can be referenced in C# via `Kentico.Xperience.Admin.Base.Icons` 2. Old icons based on Page Builder and Form Builder UI.\ Example: [Page Builder widgets](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/development/builders/page-builder/widgets-for-page-builder#register-widgets) via their registration attribute. These don't have a C# representation but can be accessed via [this icon list](https://devnet.kentico.com/docs/icon-list/index.html).
The plan is to consolidate all icons in the future to only use the new React based icons.
There is no way to extend these icon sets in Xperience by Kentico today, but I think it's a feature worth requesting on the [Xperience by Kentico roadmap](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released).
***
Note: neither set is intended to be used for visitors to a channel (e.g. a website visitor) - they are only meant for administration UI use.
